tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_price_predictions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE time_series_data ( 
   timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY, 
   stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
   opening_price DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
   closing_price DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
   high_price DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
   low_price DECIMAL NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE model_results ( 
   result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
   timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
   stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
   prediction_result VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
   accuracy DECIMAL NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_news (
    news_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id UUID,
    news_date DATE,
    headline TEXT,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_predictions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id UUID,
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_movement VARCHAR,
    confidence_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE technical_indicators (
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    rsi DECIMAL,
    macd DECIMAL,
    bollinger_bands DECIMAL,
    moving_average DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE news_sentiment (
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    positive_sentiment DECIMAL,
    negative_sentiment DECIMAL,
    total_news INT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    high_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    low_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY(stock_id, date)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_movements (
    movement_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    movement_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    movement_direction VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY(movement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE features_data (
    feature_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    feature_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    feature_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY(feature_id, date)
);

CREATE TABLE model_results (
    result_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    accuracy DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY(result_id)
);

CREATE TABLE predicted_movements (
    prediction_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    predicted_direction VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    confidence DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY(prediction_id)
);
